name: BodySite Qualifier
title: BodySite Qualifier
description: Qualifier to refine the anatomical location. These include qualifiers for laterality, relative location, directionality, number, and plane.
purpose: To provide additional information regarding the anatomical location withouth the need to use the BodySite resource.

element.definition: Qualifier to refine the anatomical location. These include qualifiers for laterality, relative location, directionality, number, and plane.
